attributes.action: Help end massacre of Christians in Nigeria
attributes.additional_details: As a country we fail to stand up against those who oppress Christians.  Our politicians are quick to condemn brutal attacks against other religions yet remain silent when it comes to Christians.  We are a predominately Christian nation and it is right that we vocalise our disgust when any religion is persecuted. This MUST extend to our brothers and sisters in Nigeria. This pure terrorism is unacceptable and all civilised nations must unite and stand against this. Let the UK lead the way.
attributes.background: Denounce the senseless murder of Christians in Nigeria and actively seek a way to help

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the murder of Christians in Nigeria, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, we could accept a petition calling on the Government to urge the Nigerian government to do more to protect Christians in Nigeria, if that's what you want to happen.
